channel.title: Articles on Salman's Corner
channel.description: Recent content in Articles on Salman's Corner

item.title: My first post
item.description:
Heyo, and welcome to my little corner of the internet. This is the first post on my personal site, a place for me to share my thoughts and projects.

I’m hoping to post here regularly. You can expect to see a mix of topics, from deep dives into software development and the tech I’m currently using, to my adventures in the great outdoors.

Stay tuned for more!
